document_data.name: Aslyn Belark
document_data.familyrefs: {{Cite web/Elminster Speaks archive|43}}{{Cite web/Elminster Speaks/Part 36: The Satraps of Delzimmer, Part 1}}
document_data.mainbody: '''Aslyn Belark''' was a member of the [[Belark]] merchant family in [[Delzimmer]] ''circa'' the [[1373 DR|Year of Rogue Dragons, 1373 DR]].
document_data.Personality:
Aslyn was the youngest of [[Oldyle Belark]]'s three sons and was very much like his older brother [[Corauth Belark|Corauth]]. He had a sadistic streak and was haughty enough to feel he could indulge his whims, especially when Corauth set the example.
__NOTOC__
document_data.Activities: Aslyn and his older brother Corauth were free to act almost with impunity around Delzimmer, rousting about town and maliciously making the lives of the common folk miserable.
